parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by type (NonFungibleESDT/SemiFungibleESDT/MetaESDT)

parameters.name: subType
parameters.description: Filter by type (NonFungibleESDTv2/DynamicNonFungibleESDT/DynamicSemiFungibleESDT)

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: Filter collections where the given address has a creator role

parameters.description: Return all collections before given timestamp

parameters.description: Filter by address with canAddUri role

parameters.name: canTransferRole

parameters.description: Do not include collections of type "MetaESDT" in the response

get.description: Returns NFT ranks in case the custom ranking preferred algorithm was set
Returns non-fungible/semi-fungible/meta-esdt tokens that belong to a collection

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Number of items to skip for the result set

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by collection identifier

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Search by token identifiers, comma-separated

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Get all nfts by name

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by one or more comma-separated tags

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: Return all NFTs associated with a given creator

parameters.name: isWhitelistedStorage
parameters.description: Return all NFTs that are whitelisted in storage

parameters.name: hasUris
parameters.description: Return all NFTs that have one or more uris

parameters.name: isNsfw
parameters.description: Filter by NSFW status

parameters.name: nonceBefore
parameters.description: Return all NFTs with given nonce before the given number

parameters.name: nonceAfter
parameters.description: Return all NFTs with given nonce after the given number

parameters.name: withOwner
parameters.description: Return owner where type = NonFungibleESDT

parameters.name: withSupply
parameters.description: Return supply where type = SemiFungibleESDT

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sorting order (asc / desc)

parameters.name: traits
parameters.description: Filter NFTs by traits. Key-value format (<key1>:<value1>;<key2>:<value2>)

get.description: Returns a list of transactions for a specific collection.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Number of items to skip for the result set

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: Address of the transaction sender

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: Search by multiple receiver addresses, comma-separated

parameters.name: senderShard
parameters.description: Id of the shard the sender address belongs to

parameters.name: receiverShard
parameters.description: Id of the shard the receiver address belongs to

parameters.name: miniBlockHash
parameters.description: Filter by miniblock hash

parameters.name: hashes
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of transaction hashes

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the transaction (success / pending / invalid / fail)

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: Filter transactions by function name

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Before timestamp

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: After timestamp

parameters.name: round
parameters.description: Filter by round number

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order (asc/desc)

parameters.name: withScResults
parameters.description: Return scResults for transactions

parameters.name: withOperations
parameters.description: Return operations for transactions

parameters.name: withLogs
parameters.description: Return logs for transactions

parameters.name: withScamInfo
parameters.description: Returns scam information

parameters.name: withUsername
parameters.description: Integrates username in assets for all addresses present in the transactions

parameters.name: withRelayedScresults
parameters.description: If set to true, will include smart contract results that resemble relayed transactions
